EmailTemplate.description: Email Notification to Partner upon Conversion of Lead to Opportunity
EmailTemplate.name: PRM Email Notification to Partner upon Conversion of Lead to Opportunity
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Opportunity.Name}- Update : Moved to Qualified Opportunity
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Opportunity.Partner_Sub_Agent_Contact__c},
Your sales lead has been moved to a qualified opportunity with an estimated close date of {!Opportunity.CloseDate}.
Click here to access your Opportunity.
Thanks, Channel Support
